name: demo23
description: Create api to get a product details pid,pname,unit_price 1. index.html->UI     Button : Get all PRoducts     Button : Get Producut by pid 2. server.js->     http://localhost:3000/ 3. app-route.js->      1.get       http://localhost:3000/app/products      2.get       http://localhost:3000/app/products/:pid     3.put       http://localhost:3000/app/products/update/:pid/:unit_price     4.delete    http://localhost:3000/app/products/delete/:pid     5.post      http://localhost:3000/app/products/add 4. product.js
